tuv.seg: Possibly this is an old Bloom Pack created before Bloom Packs could handle special characters in file names. You may be able to get the author to re-create it using a current version. If that's not possible a technical expert may be able to repair things.
创建此资料包时，Bloom还不支持文件名使用特殊字体。你可以请作者创建一个新版资料包，或者寻求技术人员的帮助。
The {0} Collection is now ready to use on this computer.
丛书{0}已经可以在此计算机上使用。

tu.note: Displayed as the message box title

tuv.seg: This BloomPack appears to be incomplete or corrupt.
此资料包不完全或已损坏。
Bloom was not able to install that Bloom Pack

tu.note: Shown while Bloom Packs are being installed

tuv.seg: Bloom is already running, but the contents will not show up until the next time you run Bloom
Bloom正在运行，下次运行Bloom时才能看到内容
The Bloom collection will not be installed.
This computer already has a Bloom collection named '{0}'. Do you want to replace it with the one from this Bloom Pack?
此计算机已经有一个叫‘{0}’的丛书，要用此资料包中的丛书替代它吗？
Bloom Packs should have only a single collection folder at the top level of the .ZIP file.
每个Bloom资料压缩包只能有一层目录
Bloom was not able to remove the existing copy of '{0}'. Quit Bloom if it is running & try again. Otherwise, try again after restarting your computer.
Bloom无法删除现有的'{0}'。如果Bloom正在运行，请退出程序重试。还不行的话重启计算机再重试。

tu.note: When you hold down a key, a popup appears that lets you choose a related character. These instructions are shown in that popup.

tuv.seg: To select, use your mouse wheel or point at what you want, then release the key.
要选中内容，按住鼠标左键，滚动鼠标滑轮或移动鼠标到待选中区域，然后松开左键
This formatting is the default for all text boxes with '{0}' style.
该字体设置是所有带'{0}'样式的文本框的默认字体设置
Changes the text size for all boxes carrying the style '{0}' and language '{1}'.\nCurrent size is {2}pt.
更改所有样式为‘{0}’语言为‘{1}’的文本框中的文本字号。\n当前字号为{2}pt.
This formatting is for all text boxes with '{0}' style.
所有带'{0}'样式的文本框都用这种字体设置
This formatting is for all {0} text boxes with '{1}' style.
所有带'{1}'样式的{0}文本框都用这种字体设置
Sorry, Reader Templates do not allow changes to formatting.
抱歉，读物模板不允许对字体设置进行修改

It appears that some part of the folder path to this book has been moved or renamed. As a result, Bloom cannot save your changes to this page, and will need to exit now. If you haven't been renaming or moving things, please click Details below and report the problem to the developers.
文件夹通向本书的部分路径已被移动或重命名，所以Bloom无法保存对本页的修改并将退出程序。如果你没有进行移动或重命名操作，请点击“详细”按钮，向程序开发者报告问题。
Open Page in Firefox (which must be in the PATH environment variable)
用Firefox浏览器打开页面（该浏览器一定要在PATH环境变量里）
Show Experimental Commands (e.g. Export XML for InDesign)
显示试验命令（例：为InDesign导出XML）
显示试验模板（例：图片词典）

tu.note: This option will probably go away, as any bugs with the Image Server get ironed out. This has to do with how Bloom works internally; the I.S. makes it work better on slow computers.

tuv.seg: Use Image Server to reduce memory usage with large images.
处理大图像时请使用图像服务器,以便减少内存用量。
Bloom is switching the default font for "{0}" to the new "Andika New Basic".
Bloom正在把"{0}"的默认字体改为"Andika New Basic"。
This will improve the printed output for most languages. If your language is one of the few that need "Andika", you can switch it back in Settings:Book Making.
对大多数语言来说，这会提高打印效果。但是如果你的语言是少数需要“Andika”字体的语言之一，请在设置：图书制作中把字体改回来。

tu.note: {0} is a language name.
Name of a Front/Back Matter Pack that puts credits on the inside of the front cover
Name of the default Front/Back Matter Pack
In a vernacular collection, we say 'Vernacular Language', but in a source collection, Vernacular has no relevance, so we use this different label
In a vernacular collection, we say 'Language 2 (e.g. National Language)', but in a source collection, National Language has no relevance, so we use this different label
In a vernacular collection, we say 'Language 3 (e.g. Regional Language)', but in a source collection, National Language has no relevance, so we use this different label
If there is no third language specified, the link changes to this.

tuv.seg: 语言3（例：地区通用语）（可选）

tu.note: If you make certain changes in the settings dialog, the OK button changes to this.

tuv.seg: Bloom will close and re-open this project with the new settings.
Bloom将会关闭，再用新设置打开项目。
Your system administrator manages Bloom updates for this computer.
在这台电脑上，Bloom更新由系统管理员负责。

tu.note: Shown at the bottom of the list of books. User can click on it and it will attempt to open a browser to show the Bloom Library

tuv.seg: Get more source books at BloomLibrary.org
从BloomLibrary.org获取更多制作书的资源

tu.note: get this clicking on BloomLibrary.org link in source collection

tuv.seg: Bloom will now open this HTML document in your word processing program (normally Word or LibreOffice). You will be able to work with the text and images of this book. These programs normally don't do well with preserving the layout, so don't expect much.
Bloom将用您的文字处理程序（一般是word或LibreOffice）打开此HTML文件。这些程序能处理书中的文本或图像，但不一定能很好地保留书的布局。
This collection is locked, so new books cannot be added/removed.
该丛刊已加锁，不能添加或删除书。

Because this is a source collection, Bloom isn't offering any existing shells as sources for new shells. If you want to add a language to a shell, instead you need to edit the collection containing the shell, rather than making a copy of it. Also, the Wall Calendar currently can't be used to make a new Shell.
因为这是一个资源集合， Bloom的现有壳书不能作为新壳书的来源.如果你想给壳书增加一种语言,你应该修改包含该壳书的资源集合,而不是直接复制该壳书.而且在现阶段,挂历也不能被用于制作新壳书.
Make a book using this source

tu.note: This is the button you use to create a new collection, open a new one, or get one from a repository somewhere.

tuv.seg: PNG 动物故事 - 复制

tu.note: Shown as the thumbnail caption when the book doesn't have a title.
Shown when Bloom tries to check for an update but can't, for example because it can't connect to the internet, or a problems with our server, etc.

tuv.seg: Could not connect to the server to check for an update. Are you connected to the internet?
无法连接服务器，无法查看更新。请确认您的电脑是否连接到互联网。
Your Bloom is up to date.
Bloom is already working on checking for updates.
A new version appears to be available, but Bloom could not install it.

tu.note: Appears after Bloom has downloaded a program update in the background and is ready to switch the user to it the next time they run Bloom.

tuv.seg: A new version of Bloom is available.

tu.note: Shown at the bottom of the list of books. User can click on it and get some explanation of why some books are hidden
In a wizard, this button takes you to the previous step.
Used for the Finish button in wizards, like that used for making a New Collection
This is shown when Bloom is slowly loading something, so the user doesn't worry about why they don't see the result immediately.
Used for the Next button in wizards, like that used for making a New Collection
In a wizard, this button takes you to the next step.

tuv.seg: Your download ({0}) is complete. You can see it in the 'Books from BloomLibrary.org' section of your Collections.
{0}已下载完成。可以从“BloomLibrary.org"的"图书”板块找到。

Bloom downloaded the book but had problems making it available in Bloom. Please restart your computer and try again. If you get this message again, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom developers.
Bloom已经下载了该书，但是无法打开它，请重启计算机再试。如果仍然出现此提示，请点击“详细”向程序工程师报告此问题。
There was a problem downloading your book.
There was a problem downloading your book. You may need to restart Bloom or get technical help.
下载书时出现问题。请重启Bloom或寻求技术支持。

There was a problem downloading the book: something took too long. You can try again at a different time, or write to us at issues@BloomLibrary.org if you cannot get the download to work from your location.
下载书时出现错误，某个部分用了太长时间。请换个时间再试，还是不能下载的话，请写邮件联系我们issues@bloomlibrary.org

tu.note: This is for the button that LAUNCHES the dialog, not the "Add this page" button that is IN the dialog.
This is for the button inside the dialog

tuv.seg: Converting to this layout will cause some content to be lost.
转换成这种布局将会导致部分内容丢失
If you need somewhere to put more information about the book, you can use this page, which is the inside of the back cover.
如果你需要空间填写更多有关本书的信息,可以使用本页(即封三).
If you need somewhere to put more information about the book, you can use this page, which is the outside of the back cover.
如果你需要空间填写更多有关本书的信息,可以使用本页(即封底).

tu.note: Shown in edit tab multilingualism chooser, for bilingual mode, 2 languages per page

tuv.seg: Open the HTML used to make this PDF, in Firefox (must be on path)
从Firefox(一定要在路径里)打开用于制作该PDF的html文件
Sorry, the copyright and license for this book cannot be changed.
抱歉，不能更改这本书的版权和许可证。
Sorry, this book is locked down so that images cannot be changed.
抱歉，这本书已加锁，不能更改图像。
This page will be permanently removed.
Choose language to make this a bilingual or trilingual book
选择语言制作双语或多语书
You need to select some text before you can copy it
请选中文本内容再复制

tu.note: get this after you edit the metadata of an image

tuv.seg: Copy this information to all other pictures in this book?
要把该信息复制到本书中的所有图片里吗？

tu.note: Shown between 'Picture' and 'Text' when Custom Page is in Layout mode

tuv.seg: You need to select some text before you can cut it
请选中文本内容再剪切
Remove this page from the book
Insert a new page which is a duplicate of this one
插入和此页完全相同的新页面
You cannot change these because this is not the original copy.
无法改动，因为这不是原始版本。
This word is not decodable in this stage.
在这个细分层次上，还不能拼读此单词
This sentence is too long for this level.
对当前等级来说，这个句子过长。
This page is an experimental prototype which may have many problems, for which we apologize.
抱歉，该页是一个实验模型，存在很多问题，请您原谅。
The current selected font is '{0}', but it is not installed on this computer. Some other font will be used.
这台电脑上没有当前选中的字体'{0}'，系统会自动使用其他字体。
Changes the text size for all boxes carrying the style '{0}' and language '{1}'.\nCurrent size is {2}pt.
更改所有样式为‘{0}’语言为‘{1}’的文本框中的文本字号。\n当前字号为{2}pt.
That style already exists. Please choose another name.
该样式已经存在,请选择其他名称
Change the spacing between lines of text
Please use only alphabetical characters. Numbers at the end are ok, as in "part2".
请只用字母，数字可以放在字母后面使用，如“part2”
You may use this space for author/illustrator, or anything else.
可以在此空白处标明作者、画家或其他信息
When you are making an original book, use this box to record contributions made by writers, illustrators, editors, etc.
制作原创读物时,请在这个方框中注明作者、画家、编辑等
When you make a book from a shell, use this box to tell who did the translation.
用框架书制作读物时,请在这个方框中注明译者

tu.note: Put {lang} in your translation, so it can be replaced by the language name.

tuv.seg: Click to Edit Copyright and License
单击这里，编辑版权与许可证
Use this to acknowledge any funding agencies.
用这个向资助机构致谢。
International Standard Book Number. Leave blank if you don't have one of these.
国际标准书号。没有书号的话，就空着。
If you need somewhere to put more information about the book, you can use this page, which is the inside of the front cover.
如果你需要空间填写更多有关本书的信息,可以使用本页(即封二).
用{lang}语言写成的原书(或框架书)致谢词
The contributions made by writers, illustrators, editors, etc., in {lang}
用{lang}语言注明作家，插画者，编辑以及其他人所做出的贡献。
向翻译版本致谢,{语言}语
To unlock this shellbook, go into the toolbox on the right, find the gear icon, and click 'Allow changes to this shellbook'.
想要解锁本壳书，在右边的工具栏找到齿轮标识，点击并选择“允许修改该壳书”
Edit Image Credits, Copyright, and License
编辑图像来源，版权和许可证。

The file you’ve chosen is a “JPEG” file. JPEG files are perfect for photographs and color artwork. However, JPEG files are a big problem for black and white line art. Problems include:
• Fuzziness and grey dots.
• Large file sizes, making the book hard to share.
• If there are many large JPEGs, Bloom may not have enough memory to make PDF files.

Note: Because JPEG is “lossy”, converting a JPEG to PNG, TIFF, or BMP actually makes things even worse. If this is black and white line art, you want to get an original scan in one of those formats.

Please select from one of the following, then click “OK”:
您选中的是JPEG文档，JPEG格式不适合黑白线条画。如果原画是黑白线条画，最好扫描并保存成以下格式中的一种，请选择并点击“确定”。
This option is only available in the Publish tab.
该选项只能在"发布"标签中使用。

tu.note: Shown in edit tab multilingualism chooser, for monolingual mode, one language per page
Default file and folder name when you make a new book, but haven't give it a title yet.

tuv.seg: Before you can paste an image, copy one onto your 'clipboard', from another program.
粘贴图像前,请先用其他程序把图像复制到剪贴板上。

tu.note: Show in the layout chooser dropdown of the edit tab, if there was only a single layout choice

tuv.seg: There are no other layout options for this template.
该模板没有其他布局选项。
This box has more text than will fit
文本超过文本框所能容纳的限制
That change is not allowed. Front matter and back matter pages must remain where they are.
无法改动，书的前后封皮位置必须保持不变。
Choose a page size and orientation
请选择页面大小和方向
There is nothing on the Clipboard that you can paste here.
剪贴板中没有能贴在这里的内容
You cannot put anything in there while making an original book.
制作原创书时，这里什么都不能放
Change the spacing between lines of text
"Normal" will show local language, and potentially regional or national, depending on the multilingual settings of the book. Use this for most content.
选择“普通”会显示土语，根据本书的多语种设置情况不同，也可能显示地区或国家通用语。该选项适用于大部分内容。
Use one of these for simple text boxes that are always in only one language.
只用一种语言的简单文本框可选择这些选项中的一项
Bloom can handle only the first {0} words.
Bloom只能处理最开始的{0}单词。
本细分层次中可使用的单词
The following is a generated report of the decodable stages for {0}. You can make any changes you want to this file, but Bloom will not notice your changes. It is just a report.
下面是对{0}的拼读细分层次的总结。可以修改该文档，但Bloom不会启用你的修改，因为它只是一份总结报告。
该细分层次中包含的字母
Open a Letter and Word List File
打开字母和单词列表文档
Generate a letter and word list report
生成字母和单词列表报告
该细分层次中包含的单词举例
该细分层次中包含的单词

tu.note: Used to create string "Level # of #". The space after this word is added programmatically.
Used to create string "Level # of #". The spaces on each side of this word are added programmatically.

tuv.seg: Bloom normally prevents most changes to shellbooks. If you need to add pages, change images, etc., tick the box below.
一般情况下Bloom会阻止对框架书的修改。如果需要加页、改图像等，请勾选下面的方框。

tu.note: This is very low priority for translation.

tuv.seg: Bloom recording is in an unusual state, possibly caused by unplugging a microphone. You will need to restart.
可能拔出麦克风时造成Bloom录音状态异常。请重启。
This computer appears to have no sound recording device available. You will need one to record audio for a talking book.
这台电脑没有录音设备，制作有声书需要录音设备。

tu.note: Appears when the speak/record button is pressed very briefly

tuv.seg: Please hold the button down until you have finished recording
1) Check that you are recording into the correct device and that these levels are showing blue:
请用合适的装置录音，音量大小最好控制在蓝色范围内
Make an e-book that can play recordings while highlighting sentences.
制作能边放录音边高亮所读句子的电子书

tu.note: This is for the button that changes the page zoom back to 100%
Shown in edit tab multilingualism chooser, for trilingual mode, 3 languages per page

tuv.seg: Bloom had a problem showing this book. This doesn't mean your work is lost, but it does mean that something is out of date, is missing, or has gone wrong.
Bloom无法显示该书，这说明该书太过时、或者某个部分丢失或出错。但你的作品并没有丢失。

Bloom had a problem showing this book. This doesn't mean your work is lost, but it does mean that something is out of date, is missing, or has gone wrong. Consider using the 'Report a Problem' command under the 'Help' menu.
Bloom无法显示该书，这说明该书太过时、或者某个部分丢失或出错。但你的作品并没有丢失。请考虑使用“帮助”菜单下的“报告错误”命令。

Bloom was unable to start its own HTTP listener that it uses to talk to its embedded Firefox browser. If this happens even if you just restarted your computer, ask someone to investigate if you have an aggressive firewall product installed. The agressive firewall product may need to be uninstalled before you can use Bloom.
Bloom的侦听程序不能从内置的火狐浏览引擎获取信息。请尝试重启Bloom，如果问题仍然存在，请技术人员查看是否因为防火墙太过活跃。是的话，需要卸载防火墙才能使用Bloom。
Your computer denied Bloom access to the book. You may need technical help in setting the operating system permissions for this file.
您的电脑阻止Bloom打开该书。请在技术人员的帮助下设置操作系统对该文档的权限。
There was a problem selecting the book. Restarting Bloom may fix the problem. If not, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom Developers.
选择书时出现错误。请尝试重启Bloom。如问题仍然存在，请点击“详细”按钮，向Bloom工程师报告此问题。
There was a problem updating the book. Restarting Bloom may fix the problem. If not, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom Developers.
更新当前书时出现错误。请尝试重启Bloom。如问题仍然存在，请点击“详细”按钮，向Bloom工程师报告此问题。

tu.note: {0} will get the name of the book, {1} will give a link to open the Bloom Library Web page.

tuv.seg: {0} requires a newer version of Bloom. Download the latest version of Bloom from {1}.
{0}需要最新版Bloom。从{1}下载Bloom的最新版本
Bloom had a problem deleting this file: {0}
Bloom had a problem importing this picture.
Report this problem to Bloom Support
向Bloom的技术支持人员报告此问题。

This Book called for Front/Back Matter pack named '{0}', but Bloom couldn't find that on this computer. You can either install a Bloom Pack that will give you '{0}', or go to Settings:Book Making and change to another Front/Back Matter Pack.
该书需要名为'{0}'的封皮资料包，Bloom无法在当前电脑上找到。您可以安装带有'{0}'的Bloom资料包，也可以去设置：图书制作，换用另一个封皮资料包。

Bloom cannot start properly, and this symptom has been observed on machines with ZoneAlarm installed. Note: disabling ZoneAlarm does not help. Nor does restarting with it turned off. Something about the installation of ZoneAlarm causes the problem, and so far only uninstalling ZoneAlarm has been shown to fix the problem.
在装有ZoneAlarm的电脑上出现过Bloom无法正常启动的情况。注：禁用和关闭ZoneAlarm不起作用，造成该问题的原因在于ZoneAlarm的安装过程，只有卸载ZoneAlarm才能解决该问题。

A component of Bloom, BloomPdfMaker.exe, seems to be missing. This prevents previews and printing. Antivirus software sometimes does this. You may need technical help to repair the Bloom installation and protect this file from being deleted again.
Bloom的重要组成部分BloomPdfMaker.exe丢失了，导致无法预览和打印。这可能是防病毒软件造成的，请寻求技术支持修复Bloom安装程序，不让该部分再被删除。

tu.note: Appears in progress indicator

tuv.seg: This script is right to left
该字体需要更大的行间距
I accept the terms of the license agreement
我接受许可协议的条款
I agree to the Bloom Library's Terms of Use
我接受Bloom Library的使用条款
There is already a collection with that name, at {0}.\nPlease pick a unique name.
该丛书名已被使用：<a href='file://{0}'>{0}>/a>。\n请选择其他名称。
Choose the Main Language For This Collection
请选择该丛书的主要语言
What would you like to call this collection?
您想给当前丛书起什么名字？
If you already have a collection you want to open, click the 'Cancel' button.
如果您已经创建了丛书，请点击“取消”按钮。

A collection of shell or template books in one or more languages of wider communication. You will be able to upload these shells to BloomLibrary.org. You may also make a Bloom Pack to give to others so that they can make vernacular books with your shells.
用广泛使用的语言编写的框架书丛书。您可以将这些框架书上传到BloomLibrary.org，也可以制成Bloom资料包，让别人用框架书制作当地语言读物。
A collection of books in a local language.
用当地语言写成的丛书。
These are optional. Bloom will place them in the right places on title page of books you create.
这些是可选项。Bloom会把它们放到你创建的书的扉页。

tu.note: The {0} is replaced by the name of the language.

tuv.seg: Unable to create a new collection using that name.
无法用该名称创建新丛书。
You are almost ready to start making books.
您很快就可以开始制作图书了。
In order to keep things simple and organized, Bloom keeps all the books you make in one or more Collections. The first thing we need to do is make one for you.
为了便于操作和管理，Bloom会将您制作的所有书收集在一个或多个丛书里Collections。因此首先要为您创建一个丛书。

Bloom detected that this collection is located in your Dropbox folder. This can cause problems as Dropbox sometimes locks Bloom out of its own files. If you have problems, we recommend that you move your collection somewhere else or disable Dropbox while using Bloom.
Bloom发现该丛书位于你的Dropbox文档里，有时这会导致Bloom无法打开自身文件。请将丛书移动到其他位置，或在使用Bloom时禁用Dropbox。
This collection is part of your 'Sources for new books' which you can see in the bottom left of the Collections tab. It cannot be opened for editing.
该丛书属于“新书资源”所以无法修改，“新书资源”位于丛书标签的左下角。

tu.note: This shows in the file-open dialog that you use to open a different bloom collection

tuv.seg: Browse for another collection on this computer
浏览这台计算机里的其他丛书
Copy From Chorus Hub on Local Network
从局域网上的Chorus Hub复制

tu.note: This opens the Chorus Help to learn more about send/receive.

tuv.seg: Has someone else used Send/Receive to share a collection with you?\nUse one of these red buttons to copy their collection to your computer.\nLater, use Send/Receive to share your work back with them.
有人用“发送/接收”向你分享丛书吗？\n可以点击红色按钮把他们的丛书复制到你的电脑上。\n然后也通过“发送/接受”与他们分享你的丛书。
Pages can not be re-ordered when you are translating a book.
翻译书时页面不能重新排序
Please install Adobe Reader so that Bloom can show your completed book. Until then, you can still save the PDF Book and open it in some other program.
如果要在Bloom上显示已完成的书，请安装Adobe Reader。或者你可以把书保存成PDF格式，再用别的软件打开。
That's strange... Adobe Reader gave an error when trying to show that PDF. You can still try saving the PDF Book.
异常...Adobe Reader显示PDF时出错，不过你仍然可以把书保存为PDF格式。

Sad News. Bloom wasn't able to get Adobe Reader to show here, so Bloom can't show your completed book.\nPlease uninstall your existing version of 'Adobe Reader' and (re)install 'Adobe Reader'.\nUntil you get that fixed, you can still save the PDF Book and open it in some other program.
抱歉，Adobe Reader不无法显示，看不到已完成的书。请卸载并重装“Adobe Reader”。在问题解决之前可以把书保存成PDF格式，用其他软件打开。
Make a booklet from the inside pages of the book. Pages will be laid out and reordered so that when you fold it, you'll have a booklet.\n
用书的内页制作小册子。为了确保内页折叠后成为一本小册子,页面将被重新排列和布局。
Upload to BloomLibrary.org, where others can download and localize into their own language.
上传到BloomLibrary.org，以便别人下载并修改以适应当地语言。
Make a PDF of just the front and back (both sides), so you can print on colored paper.
把书的封皮部分（封面和封二，封三和封底）做成PDF，以便用彩纸单独打印。
Make an ePUB (electronic book) out of this book, allowing it to be read on various electronic reading devices.
把该书做成电子版，可以在各种电子阅读设备上使用。

tu.note: This is the title of a dialog about exporting a Bloom book to the InDesign XML format

tuv.seg: This PDF viewer can be improved by installing the free Adobe Reader on this computer.
在本计算机上安装免费的Adobe Reader可以提高PDF文件的浏览效果。

tu.note: Instead of making a booklet, just make normal pages

tuv.seg: Make a PDF of every page of the book, one page per piece of paper.
把书的每一页都做成PDF，一页一张
Open the PDF in the default system PDF viewer
用系统默认的pdf阅览器打开PDF文档
Bloom had a problem making a PDF of this book. You may need technical help or to contact the developers. But here are some things you can try:
Bloom无法生成此书的PDF格式。请寻求技术帮助或联系软件开发者，也可以尝试这些做法：
Try doing this on a computer with more memory
请使用内存更大的电脑
Restart your computer and try this again right away
Replace large, high-resolution images in your document with lower-resolution ones
把文档里大的高清图像替换成低清图像
All rights reserved (Contact the Copyright holder for any permissions.)
版权所有（如有需要，请联系版权所有者）
BloomLibrary.org already has a previous version of this book from you. If you upload it again, it will be replaced with your current version.
BloomLibrary.org 已有这本书之前的版本。如再次上传，旧版本将会被替换成新版本。
Sorry, there was a problem uploading {0}. Some details follow. You may need technical help.
抱歉，上传{0}时出错。详情见下文，您可能需要技术支持。
One or more fields above need your attention before uploading.
以上有一个或多个方面需要处理，请处理好后再上传。

Sorry, "{0}" was not successfully uploaded. Sometimes this is caused by temporary problems with the servers we use. It's worth trying again in an hour or two. If you regularly get this problem please report it to us.
By uploading, you confirm your agreement with the Bloom Library Terms of Use and grant the rights it describes.
上传表示您已经接受Bloom Library的使用条款并授予我们条款中列出的权限。
There was a problem uploading your book.
We cannot sign you up with that address, because we already have an account with that address. Would you like to log in instead?
该邮件地址已被注册，请登录。
Bloom could not connect to the server to verify your login. Please check your network connection.
Bloom无法连接服务器，登录验证不成功。请检查网络连接。
Bloom could not connect to the server to complete your login or signup. This could be a problem with your internet connection, our server, or some equipment in between.
Bloom无法连接服务器，登录或注册不成功。可能您的网络连接、我们的服务器或中间设备出现故障。
In order to sign up for a BloomLibrary.org account, you must check the box indicating that you agree to the BloomLibrary Terms of Use.
要注册BloomLibrary.org帐户，勾选方框表示接受BloomLibrary.org的使用条款。
We don't have a user on record with that email. Would you like to sign up?
用户记录不存在。请注册。
Password and user ID did not match
Please agree to terms of use
Please enter a valid email address. We will send an email to this address so you can reset your password.
请输入真实的电子邮箱。我们会把重设密码的邮件发送给您。
Bloom could not connect to the server to reset your password. Please check your network connection.
Bloom无法连接服务器，重设密码不成功。请检查网络连接。
We are sending an email to {0} with instructions for how to reset your password.
重设密码的方法已发送到这个电子邮件地址：{0}
Bloom could not log in to BloomLibrary.org using your saved credentials. Please check your network connection.
Bloom无法用您的已存信息登录BloomLibrary.org。请检查网络连接。
Sorry, this version of Bloom Desktop is not compatible with the current version of BloomLibrary.org. Please upgrade to a newer version.
抱歉，您桌面上的Bloom版本与BloomLibrary.org不兼容。请升级为较新的版本。
Please log in to BloomLibrary.org (or sign up) before uploading

tu.note: This shows next to the license, if the license has not yet been set.

tuv.seg: Please set this from the edit tab
Suggestion: Assigning a Creative Commons License makes it easy for you to clearly grant certain permissions to everyone.
建议：使用创作公用授权，便于清楚地把某些权限授予大家。
Suggestion: Creative Commons Licenses make it much easier for others to use your book, even if they aren't fluent in the language of your custom license.
建议：创作公用授权能让大家更方便地使用你的书，即使他们不熟悉你用于自定权限的语言也没关系。

There was a problem uploading your book. This is probably because your computer is set to use the wrong timezone or your system time is badly wrong. See http://www.di-mgt.com.au/wclock/help/wclo_setsysclock.html for how to fix this.
上传书时出现错误。可能因为您的电脑的时区设定错误，或是系统时间出错，修复方法请查看http:www.di-mgt.com.au/wclock/help/wclo_setsysclock.html
Congratulations, "{0}" is now available on BloomLibrary.org ({1})
There was a problem uploading your book. You may need to restart Bloom or get technical help.
上传书时出现错误。您可能需要重启Bloom或寻求技术支持。

tu.note: In this step, Bloom is uploading things like title, languages, and topic tags to the BloomLibrary.org database.

tuv.seg: About Word Lists and Sample Texts: When you place text files in your sample texts folder, the Decodable Reader Tool can find words to suggest while you are creating your readers.
词表和样本文本。如你把文本文件放入样本文本文件夹里，当你制作读者时，解码读者工具就能提供词句。
Don't have a word list for you language yet? Consider using SIL's free WeSay software and the RapidWords.net technique to easily collect lots of words and get started on a dictionary.
没有你语言的单词列表吗？查看SIL免费的WeSay软件。加上RapidWords.net的方法，能让你很容易的收集大量的单词，并写成字典。
Don't have texts for your language yet? Check out SIL's free SayMore software. With it you can record people and then transcribe what they said.
没有你语言里的文本吗？查看SIL免费的SayMore软件。它能把录音自动抄写出来。
Please add texts to the Sample Texts folder.
请在示范文本文件夹里添加文本。
Click on letters to add them to this stage.
E.g. "ai oo sh ng th ing"
例："ai oo sh ng th ing"
Help exporting and converting files to use as sample texts
帮助导出文本并将其转换成示范文本
List letters and word-forming characters in alphabetic order.
按字母顺序排列字母和成词字符。
To help you make decodable readers, Bloom needs to know the letters and letter combinations that you will be teaching.
为了制作拼读读物，Bloom需要知道你要教哪些字母和字母组合。
Separate each letter or letter combination with a space. For example, here is what we might use for the English language:
用空格隔开单词或单词组合。以英语为例：
Notice that the English list includes symbols that are used to make words, like ' in
注意：英文列表里有用于造词的符号，如：‘ in”
Maximum Average Length of Sentences in Book
书中句子平均长度的最大值
每书词数上限（重复出现的单词不算）
Open the sample texts folder for this language.
打开这种语言的示范文本文件夹。
拖动行重新排列等级顺序。
拖动行重新排列细分层次的顺序。
用于识字教育的搜索引擎
set up the alphabet for this language.
Things to remember for this level:
这个水平要注意的事项:
To help you make decodable readers, Bloom can suggest words that fit within the current stage. There are two ways to give words to Bloom:
制作拼读读物时，Bloom能建议使用适合当前阶段的词。有两种方法可以为Bloom提供单词：
We are using lists of allowed words to define stages
我们正在用几个可用单词列表来划分细分层次
We are using letters with sight words to define stages
我们正在用字母和整体识别单词来划分细分层次

In addition, this Bloom Pack will carry your latest decodable and leveled reader settings for the \"{0}\" language. Anyone opening this Bloom Pack, who then opens a \"{0}\" collection, will have their current decodable and leveled reader settings replaced by the settings in this Bloom Pack. They will also get the current set of words for use in decodable readers.
此外，Bloom资料包包含的是\"{0}\"语言最新的拼读读物和等级读物的设置数据。所以如果你打开资料包以后又打开\"{0}\"丛书，丛书中的设置将被资料包中的设置覆盖，也将得到可用于拼读读物的所有单词。
The following books will be made into templates:

tu.note: Place a {0} where the name of the program goes.

tuv.seg: Please take a minute to register {0}

tu.note: Place a {0} where the name of the program goes.

tuv.seg: I'm stuck, I'll finish this later.

tu.note: Place a {0} where the name of the program goes.
Shown in the button that closes the dialog after a successful report submission.

tuv.seg: Bloom was not able to submit your report directly to our server. Please retry or email {0} to {1}.
Bloom无法提交报告到服务器。请重试或发送邮件{0}到{1}。
Unfortunately, {0} is too large to upload. If we need the book in order to work on your problem we will contact you.
{0}太大无法提交，如果修复问题时需要用到此书，我们会联系您。

tu.note: Shown if there was an error submitting the report. Lets the user try submitting it again.

tuv.seg: See what else will be submitted

tu.note: This is shown while Bloom is sending the problem report to our server.

tuv.seg: We received your report, thanks for taking the time to help make Bloom better!
您的报告已收到，谢谢您帮助我们将Bloom做得更好！
What seems to be the problem?

tu.note: This is shown while Bloom is creating the problem report. It's generally too fast to see, unless you include a large book.

tuv.seg: I get it. Do not show this again.
我知道了。不再显示此对话框。
Please notice the sample printer settings below. Use them as a guide while you set up the printer.
设置打印机时请先看下面的设置示范
This script is right to left
A blank page that allows you to add items.
Page with a picture on top and a large, centered word below.
图片在页面上方，单词放大居中位于图片下方

tu.note: This label indicates a page with one arithmetic problem on it.
This label indicates a page with two arithmetic problems on it.
This label indicates a page with three arithmetic problems on it.
This label indicates a page with four arithmetic problems on it.

tu.tuid: You may use this space for author/illustrator, or anything else.

tuv.seg: You may use this space for author/illustrator, or anything else.
这里存放作者，插画者，或其他的资料。
